attributes.action: To stop giving in to Muslim requests.to get a Labour vote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Prime Minister seems to think it is okay to bow to the requests and favour of the Muslim religion not race.
This is all in the anti-British feeling of this Government towards its own people just to secure a vote for Labour.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
